Overview
--------

The package provides a number of GenericSetup-profiles that set up
various types of content based on "Lorem Ipsum" text.

It also provides a new content action that instantly fills the object
with auto-generated content.

Usage
-----

Test profiles
       Include the ZCML-slug and use the Generic Setup tool
       to run the test content profiles.

Interactive intefrace
       Run the GS profile to setup the package ui.
